name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I bring a robust skill set in **Python**, **FastAPI**, and cloud technologies, specifically **Kubernetes** and **Postgres**. My proficiency in **Golang** allows me to design and implement highly efficient backend systems, while my expertise in **DDD** (Domain-Driven Design) and **Clean Architecture** enables me to create scalable, maintainable applications.
I have a proven track record of integrating **AI** and **ML** technologies within enterprise solutions, leveraging advanced tools like **LangChain** for enhanced processing capabilities. My operational experience with **Kafka** for real-time data streaming and knowledge of collaboration tools such as **GitLab CI** streamlines deployment and improves software quality through **TDD** (Test-Driven Development) practices.
I thrive in **Agile** environments and am committed to delivering secure, high-performance solutions that meet stringent compliance standards. My background in building enterprise-grade platforms positions me uniquely to contribute significantly to innovative projects.
